info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 6:27AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Otter Tail County through 700 AM CDT... At 627 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Clitherall, or 20 miles east of Fergus Falls, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Battle Lake, Henning, Deer Creek, Bluffton, Clitherall, Vining and Almora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
